buginformation.summary: method get result multi start univariate real optimizer
buginformation.description: multistartunivariaterealoptimizer package optimization the method getresult returns the result the last run the underlying optimizer this last result might not the best one which case will not correspond the value returned the optimize method this confusing and does not seem very useful think that getresult should defined public double getresult return optima and similarly public double getfunctionvalue return optimavalues
